title: Episode #31 - Why Did People Drink So Much Beer In The Middle Ages?
itunes:author: History Is Sexy
itunes:summary:
This time, Emma and Janina dive into a big vat of history, answering a question from Emma's Mum's friend: "In medieval times, how come there was so much ale available. What was it made of, how come it was so available and how was it made and transported?"

Sources: https://historyissexy.com/show-notes/episode-31-beer-middle-ages
